alert.note: Alert for Aibonito; Coamo (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 26 at 7:11PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM AST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Puerto Rico, including the following counties, Aibonito and Coamo. * WHEN...Until 815 PM AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 611 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 0.5 to 1 inch and excessive runoff from recent heavy rains are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Coamo, Aibonito, Los Llanos, Pastos and Palmarejo. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
